description:
US Army Multi Truck Transport – Crazy Cargo Drive is one of the thrilling trendy games in 3D monster truck simulation games. You can do monster truck race. You will find it like an action movie game where you have to show your driving skills and act as car transporter uphill. Transport duty is basically the driver duty of the transporter and driver. Show your precision driving skills by driving, speeding and racing multiple types of cargo trucks and vehicles in the hill and mountain surroundings. You are a 3d truck driver to keep trucking on curvy roads. US Army Multi Truck Transport – Crazy Cargo Drive is a monster worldwide cargo transporter simulation game where you have to show monster truck stunts. Then you are given a nice game to fulfill your racing mania.

While driving truck as a hill runner, your automobile is a big truck transporter to do amazing race. US Army Multi Truck Transport – Crazy Cargo Drive is a 3d truck driving with multiple interesting and crazy missions. Drive your super monster truck for hill race as a winter truck simulator. This is a heavy truck to be used as oil tanker, car transporter, bike transporter, criminal transporter and farm transporter. So it is a multi dimensional and multi-purpose cargo transporter simulation game.

Total steps in the US Army Multi Truck Transport – Crazy Cargo Drive game are 10. Carry cargo items from start to the destination point. Speed up your truck like a 4x4 car, luxury limousine, 6x6 jeep and heavy duty truck and trailer. Keep an eye on timer as well. Don’t lose time to complete your task or game step. Now it’s your time to download, play and enjoy.
